Loading dataset

```{R}

ds_toadd <- read.csv('C:\\Users\\haozh\\Desktop\\LL\\GFBI_data\\dswithinfo_onlyrecent_stem_4class_20211208.csv')

head(ds_toadd)
```


```{R}
ds_toadd[duplicated(ds_toadd[,c(1:2)]),]

```



```{R}
ds_toadd <- cbind(index = 1:nrow(ds_toadd), ds_toadd)

ds_toadd$lon <- ds_toadd$longitude

ds_toadd$lat <- ds_toadd$latitude

head(ds_toadd)
```


```{R}

library(readr)

write_csv(ds_toadd,'C:\\Users\\haozh\\Desktop\\LL\\GFBI_data\\dswithinfo_recent_stem_4class_20211208.csv')

```
